eu_initiatives: The Association follows with great interest in the field of; water and energy efficiency, product Standards, sustainability, circular economy, trade relation and agreements.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
CEIR, FECS, CPA. NHIC, CIPHE, SNIPEF, FMB 
bathroom-association.org.uk
goals__remit: The BMA is a trade association for bathroom manufacturers with the main aim to act as the voice of the industry on all matters impacting on manufacturers.  We provide a platform to discuss, debate and take action where necessary.  The Association ensures it is well placed to become the first point of call on all bathroom related issues for manufacturers, government, NGOs and members of the media.
